technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Right ovary shows mildly thickened appearance.
Testes are homogeneous with normal vascularity.
Breast tissue shows smooth-walled lesion measuring 39.7 mm.
Right kidney demonstrates hypoechoic, no hydronephrosis.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 11.04 bpm.
Soft tissue region demonstrates well-defined without fluid collection.
impression: Appearance concerning for possible malignancy—correlate clinically.
recommendations: MRI or CT correlation may be helpful.
